name: orca-discord-bot
description: A Discord Bot that Hosts the Necessary Orca and OpenMPI Packages, can Run Orca Simulations through simple commands

scripts.docker: npm run build && docker build -t mrdnalex/orcabot .
scripts.rundocker: npm run docker && docker rm -f orcabot && cls && docker run -it --name orcabot --restart=always --shm-size=100G -v C:/Users/MrDNA/Downloads/OrcaBind:/OrcaJobsArchive mrdnalex/orcabot

author: MrDNA
